revised_title: Novel Lyotropic Liquid Crystalline Arrangement in Dogfish Egg Capsule
tldr: The study investigates the molecular orientations in the extruded collagenous composite of the dogfish egg capsule. The researchers discovered a novel lyotropic liquid crystalline arrangement, which is different from the twisted nematic construction. The spinnerets play a crucial role in controlling molecular orientations in the egg case, providing insights into the development and health of collagenous composite materials.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
